content.text: 0) Place all ingredients in a blender container.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "all ingredients"@9:24 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-0 )
			:ref ( ing-1 )
			:ref ( ing-2 )
			:ref ( ing-3 )
			:ref ( ing-4 )
		)
		:gol ( tool-0-0 "a blender container"@28:47 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Cover and process on high until smooth.
